segments.text: Let me see . A roasted duck is 15 dollars . A plate of pork is 10 dollars . A bowl of beef is 6 dollars . Two bottles of beer are 3 dollars.That ' ll be a total of 34 dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is 40 dollars.Keep the change , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , sorry , sir.We take no tips here.Thank you all the same .
segments.speaker: S2
